title: Rito pls 18 RP off the release Southern Cross Kassadin
body:
Rito pls I am 18 RP off the Southern Cross Kassadin when he will be released, and even though I will never play this character I want the skin because I am a chump for marketing. I even drew you a highly quality picture as part of my appeal.

Edit: I realise I have misused the fill tool and now the text is garbage. I'm going to pretend its intentionally like that

replies.body: Send them a support ticket with a good story and that picture and they might consider giving you those Riot Points.
That's beautiful tbh send in a ticket, hope you get it
cosmic kassadin, and just send a ticket and I still think the southern cross looks more like a ?
You should change your summoner name to pablo picasso.
